page.title: 03FERNY HILL FARM-HADLEY ROAD
page.content: Mr and Mrs Wright are the tenant farmers,the land belonging to the GLC. Part-time help is employed to assist with harvest,haymaking and in the Farm Shop.It is a mixed farm covering 230 acres of which 155 acres is farmland for crops other than grass.Wheat, oilseed,rape,barley and potatoes are grown.65 acres is intensively managed grassland.60 cattle,crossbred for beef production are kept and sold through the local market.5 to 10 acres is normal woodland. The Wrights own all their own machinery.When we looked round the farm we saw a milking parlour,some large weighing scales,a combine harvester,a potato harvester,tractor, trailers and many varied farm buildings including the farmhouse itself,poultry houses for the 4-5000 poultry and various storage barns.
